MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH30 postcode area of South Queensferry. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm to carryout out repair work on the underground cable network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:25pm on 5th April 2021.
